txt.en: Maediel has gone missing. Her daughter, Dolhendeth, is worried because lately she has decided to go for long walks in dangerous areas. She is worried that Maediel has been captured and has asked you to bring her back to her.

'Where could she have gone? Do you think that you can help me?

'My mother, Maediel, has taken a fancy for long walks by herself. The problem is that she often does not choose the safest places to take her walks. She has not come back for several days, and I am worried that perhaps she has found herself in some trouble. There have been many reports about sorcerers from Dol Guldur taking prisoners and horrible atrocities being visited upon these prisoners.

'Can you find my mother, Maediel, in the dungeons of Dol Guldur and return her to me?'
Maediel is in the Dungeons of Dol Guldur.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. I would not know what I would do if my mother were to perish.\n\n'Please, take this as a token of my gratitude.'
Dolhendeth is at Ost Galadh in Emyn LÃ»m, to the west of Dol Guldur.\n\nYou should tell Dolhendeth that you have found and rescued Maediel.
Tell Person H that you have found Prisoner H.
Talk to Dolhendeth at Ost Galadh
Tell Person H that you have found Prisoner H
